channel.title: WSL on Coding notes
channel.description: Recent content in WSL on Coding notes

item.title: Run WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux)
item.description: Open git bash (better for linux than powershell I believe) and run wsl --list --online wsl --install Ubuntu Run docker on windows folder cd /mnt/c/Users/bustroker/windowsfolder$ docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/windowsfolder openapitools/openaexpi-diff /windowsfolder/openapi_v2.json /windowsfolder/openapi_v3.json
